Translations.Text: H
My nie reveal Quran ona zapricinit ona any hardship
Len do remind the reverent
revelation z Creator zem high heavens
The Vela Gracious; He assumed all authority
Do Him belongs everything heavens zem everything them everything ground
(Ona declare tvoj convictions nie) He zauzlit secret co vecer zatajit
GOD there NIE bol INAK god Him. Do Him belong the vela dobry vola sa
Ona noted history Moses
When he saw zapalit he said do jeho rodina Zostat tu. Ja seen zapalit. Maybe ja bring ona some z it zalozit some guidance zapalit
When he pojdem it he bol vola sa O Moses
Ja bol tvoj Lord zosadit tvoj sandals! Ona bol sacred valley Tuwaa
Ja zvolit si ona so listen do co revealed
Ja bol GOD there nie bol inak god Mna. Ona kult Mna alone observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) zapamatat si Mna
Hodiny (koniec z world iste pojdem; ja keep it skoro zatajit each soul je platit for its robota)
Nie diverted therefrom by those nie verit v it -those pursue ich own nazor -lest ona jesen
Co je this v tvoj na pravo hand Moses
He said This bol moj staff Ja chudy it herd moj sheep it ja pouzivat it inak ucel
He said Throw it nadol Moses
He threw it nadol whereupon it turned into moving serpent
He said Pick it nie bol afraid! My spatny listok it its irecity statny
A hold tvoj hand tvoj kulisy; it pod biely blemish iny proof
My thus show ona some z our velka portents
Ist Pharaoh he transgressed
